visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts treemap chart that visualizes the export data of Denmark in 2018. The chart should have a title 'Denmark Export 2018' and a subtitle 'Source: Harvard.edu'. The treemap should display the percentage of each export category, with data labels formatted to show the category name and its percentage value. The chart should have a white background with black borders for the treemap cells. The data should be fetched from 'https://www.highcharts.com/samples/data/denmark-export-2018.json'. Additionally, the chart should be accessible, with a screen reader section and a detailed description provided.

accessibility.description: Tree map detailing exported goods from Denmark in 2018. The services category is the largest, and makes up 39% of the total export. Transport services are the most exported. Chemicals are the second most exported category with 13%, then agriculture with 12%, and machinery with 10%. The other categories are textiles, electronics, metals, minerals, vehicles, stone, and other.

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration object is designed to render a treemap chart that visualizes the export data of Denmark in 2018. The chart is of type 'treemap', which is suitable for hierarchical data visualization. The title of the chart is 'Denmark Export 2018', and the subtitle indicates the source of the data as 'Harvard.edu'. The accessibility features are enabled, including a screen reader section and a detailed description of the chart's content. The treemap cells are styled with a white background and black borders, and the data labels are formatted to display the category name and its percentage value. The tooltip provides additional information when hovering over the cells, showing the category name and its percentage value. The data for the chart is expected to be fetched from 'https://www.highcharts.com/samples/data/denmark-export-2018.json', and the chart is configured to allow drilling down into the nodes for more detailed information.
